General.Name: Xtep International Holdings Limited
General.Description: Xtep International Holdings Limited engages in the design, development, manufacture, and marketing of sports footwear, apparel, and accessories for adults and children. It operates in three segments: Mass Market, Athleisure, and Professional Sports. The company sells its products primarily under the Xtep, K-Swiss, Palladium, Saucony, and Merrell brand names. It also operates stores in the Asia-Pacific, North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Africa regions. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Tower A, Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong
